title: Resolve discrepancy between `yarn lint` outputs on CI and local
body:
## Explanation

- The [latest CI run on the main branch](https://github.com/MetaMask/core/actions/runs/6774618500/job/18412123168) is reporting 248 eslint warnings, but running `yarn lint` on local results in 207 warnings.
  - Both environments are using `node v20.9.0`, `yarn v3.3.0`.

- The contents of the warnings are also severely divergent.
